welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cittadella, the charming walled city in Italy! Get ready to immerse yourself in our rich history and vibrant culture, and don't forget to wander through our iconic medieval walls and explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require registration and have time limits.
